name: Scrap Chimera
effectText: This card cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster, except for the Synchro Summon of a "Scrap" monster, and all other Synchro Material Monsters must also be "Scrap" monsters. When this card is Normal Summoned, you can select 1 "Scrap" Tuner monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it.
